categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Ripclaw was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer. It was apparently named after an Alderaanian predator.

It was dispatched to the Delphon system in order to repel the Black Hole Gang which were heavily raiding Delphon, causing its economy to collapse. The arrival of the Imperial Star Destroyer caused the gang to scatter.
